Front-end Developer

Hello, I'm Sofian a web developer!
I love creating beautiful, clean & intuitive websites.
Learn a bit more about me.

Skills

I'm Specialized in

Concepting

I love to connect with clients or working in a team to transform an idea into a stunning design. Using tools like Balsamiq and Photoshop I create wireframes then build up the interface keeping design paterns in mind.

Responsive

I create websites, that look great on any device, using HTML - CSS and JavaScript. I love building from scratch, I'm also proficient with front-end frameworks like Bootstrap, Foundation and Semantic ui.

Scaling

When it comes to building solid interactive web applications I use AngularJS (MEAN Stack) or React, but if the scope is a better fit I can also setup and customize open source systems like WordPress & Magento.

Performance & Accessibility

Websites are meant to captivate an audience but we can't always anticipate who are visitors are or where they come from. That is why I build websites that are lightning fast and that meet WCAG 2.0 standards.
